title: Software Development Competency Enhancement: Digital Game-Based Elementary Mathematics Education Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop one prototype of an elementary math educational game by applying five DGBL (Digital Game-Based Learning) design principles.
Learners can measure a 30% reduction in students’ math anxiety index through game-based assessment.
Learners can create two DGBL lesson designs applicable to real classroom settings via project-based team activities (5-7 member teams).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
